entries.text: #0Talk-1st time with less than 8 Intelligence
Hmm...
I see light, but it remains dim...
I am Carhillion, and I've no interest in the magic-impaired.
#0Talk-1st time with 8 or more Intelligence
Hmm...I sense power...
Very well. From this day, you shall be my new pupil.
I am Carhillion. Carhillion of the Fold. Surely you've heard the name?
Now, now, do not be afraid. Let us explore the limits of sorcery.
#0Talk-2nd time with 8 or more Intelligence
Do you seek my teachings? Very well, very well.
#0Talk-3rd time with 8 or more Intelligence
Back already? Your diligence is commendable.
#0Talk-1st time after resting at a Bonfire
Your visit is welcome. I trust you've kept up your studies.
#0Talk-2nd time after resting at a Bonfire
Oh, there you are. Do you seek my teachings?
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time
The forces of magic, and souls, lie dormant in this land.
It is a fitting place to hone my sorceries.
I suspect that I may even conjure up new spells here.
Sorcery is yet a mystery, even to me. Let us mature together, young pupil.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time
Use scrolls to unleash the power of sorceries.
But the power of each scroll is reliant on that of its owner.
The untrained cannot wield a scroll to its proper potential.
Never forget, young pupil... There are no shortcuts to mastery.
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" after defeating the Flexile Sentry
Young pupil, may we meet again, in Majula.
#0Talk-1st time
Oh, so you've finally decided to join us?
Let us resume our exploration of sorcery.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time
I sense a dark power here.
Something akin to sorcery... Only more...primordial...
I wish to find out more about it, but as we see, this place is in ruins.
Just what happened here?
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time
Sorcery was created long, long ago.
Some say it was originated by the great pale being...
But we've no way of knowing if such claims are true.
Many sorceries were lost over the ages.
Before pyromancy, there were fire sorceries, but they are long forgotten.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" before encountering Rosabeth of Melfia
On my trip here, I met a strange girl once or twice.
After a time, I never saw her again. I wonder where she went off to.
We spoke only a few times, but... A fair lass, if a bit clumsy.
I hope that she is safe.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 1st time after Rosabeth of Melfia has arrived in Majula
Sorcery and pyromancy thrive in Melfia. I've spent much time there, trying to perfect my art.
But staying was a mistake. The fools there had no interest in truth.
Their ambitions were paltry, and their smiles cloying. I was sick to the back teeth of their petty squabbles.
There was nothing for me in that forsaken land.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" 2nd time after Rosabeth of Melfia has arrived in Majula
So, the girl's been here too.
I'm glad to see her safe, whatever that's worth.
#0Menu-Choose "Talk" after attaining 30 Intelligence
Ah, here, a fitting gift for you.
Seek higher planes, young pupil.
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" without purchasing something
One day, my teachings will save you.
#0Menu-Choose "Leave" after purchasing something
Young pupil, do not take my teachings lightly.
#0After leaving abruptly
The path is yet long, young pupil.
#0Upon being attacked-1st time
Stop that!
#0Upon being attacked-2nd time
Have you lost your head?
#0Upon being attacked & made hostile
The arrogance of the young!
#0Upon approaching him, after he has previously killed the protagonist
Behold my true power.
#0Upon killing the protagonist
How very tragic...
#0After reducing his health to 50% or lower
Damn, you bloody fool!
##Do not neglect your studies, dear pupil.
##…Oh, a guest.
##Indeed. I am the great wizard, the Karion of the Darkness
##You seem talented. I usually don't take disciples, but I will specially give you a lesson.
##The result will depend on your effort. Now let us start.
##What is it? Don't you know I'm Busy?
##If you want to learn from me then first, you must understand the reason of the spells. Though, it seems to be a little early for your head.
##You want the scroll? Good.
##You again. Do you want the new scroll?
##I knew it was about the time you come. So, do you want my lesson?
##It's you. Well, I shouldn't turn my disciple down. Which scroll do you want?
##Oh, there you are.
##Thanks for your help. What will happen if get caught...
##It's a thank you gift. I usually don't take disciples, but I will specially give you a lesson.
##The result will depend on your effort. Now let us start.
##It will be up to you to control the new power you mastered. Work hard.
##Come again when you truly need me.
##The next time we meet, it will be at Madula. You should be looking forward for the new spell to be completed.
##The spell will be released by unsealing the power inside the letters.
##If you have the “scroll” with power sealed in it, it will be easy to release the spell.
##But its power will be week if the sourcerer is not grounded.
##If you want to handle the spell, improve yourself.
##If you want to use the power of spell, you need to store the scrolls in the spell book.
##Spell book is an item that will meditate your power to the scroll.
##A poor book won't store that much spells. If you want to master the spells, keep your eye on the book's quality.
##Once, I had another disciple.
##She handled the spells well, but was always afraid of something.
##She said she wanted to be independent, so I sent her off… but never heard from har since then.
##I wander what she is doing now.
##You're a modest one. You saved me, and ask for nothing.
##Thanks for your help. What will happen if get caught...
##This land is a good place for collecting magic. Maybe the vestige of the old battle is giving the power.
##I use the power to seal the new spell… however, the souls are slightly lacking, so it is not working well
##So… won't you provide some souls for me?
##I will promise you to present the completed scroll as a return. What do you think?
##Good, good… well then, let me start finishing it right now.
##After I finish this work, I will head to Madula. That land also generates great power once in a while.
##The next time we meet, it will be at Madula. You should be looking forward for the new spell to be completed.
##Hmm… well that's a sever treatment for a troubled old man. Well, fine.
##Come back any time if you change your mind
##There is no way this will be enough
##I'm sorry but won't you collect more souls? Thank you
##Stop! Let me defeat you with magic!
##What? Done already?
##What!?
##Stop it all ready!
##why!?
##Have you gone insane!?
##How dear you! Take my magic!
##Not enough? Don't you think that I will forgive you!
##Not bad…
##This is over!
##How…. could this happen…
##How fool of you to fight me.
